ygData.subject: Re: [gladiator] Single Bonded Dual Class
ygData.msgSnippet: Odd. It s a rather good idea though, It d be a valuable asset but once one got killed they d both die, and it d kill all your money quickly.

got killed they'd both die, and it'd kill all your money quickly.
